# startTask(toRender:from:to:at:)

**Instance Method**

Renders a portion of an image to a point in the destination.

## Declaration

```swift
func startTask(toRender image: CIImage, from fromRect: CGRect, to destination: CIRenderDestination, at atPoint: CGPoint) throws -> CIRenderTask
```

## Parameters

- **image**: A [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] to render.
- **fromRect**: The part of the image to render, as if cropped.
- **destination**: A [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderDestination] into which to render the image.
- **atPoint**: An origin point in the destination at which to place the image.

## Return Value

An asynchronous [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderTask] to render the image to the specified destination.

## Discussion

This method crops the image to the specified rectangle and renders the result at the indicated origin point. If the image’s [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage/extent] property and `fromRect` argument values are infinite, this call renders the image’s (0, 0) point starting from the origin `atPoint`.

You must use an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture]-backed [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext] to support an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture]-backed [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderDestination]. Similarly, you must use `GLContext`-backed [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext] to support a `GLTexture`-backed [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderDestination].

This call returns as soon as it enqueues all work required to render the image on the context’s device. In many situations, after issuing a render, you may need to wait for it to complete. In these cases, use the returned [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderTask] as follows:



## Customizing Render Destination

- **prepareRender(_:from:to:at:)**: An optional call to warm up a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext] so that subsequent calls to render with the same arguments run more efficiently.
- **startTask(toClear:)**: Fills the entire destination with black or clear depending on its [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderDestination/alphaMode].
- **startTask(toRender:to:)**: Renders an image to a destination so that point (0, 0) of the image maps to point (0, 0) of the destination.
